description: Yuuhi is the main heroine in the series. She is very beautiful, which often causes trouble for her, such as being harassed constantly by men. One day, when she was being harassed by two men, she was saved by Jun`ichi. She transferred to his school hoping meet her fianc√© because she heard that he was in this area. Later, after a misunderstanding from Jun`ichi, he kisses her in public, causing her to have ill feelings towards him, but her feelings grow more for him throughout the series.
name: Katagiri Yuuhi
